mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_reward_info(reward_id, name, acquired_date, agency, content) VALUES(user_reward_info_seq.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{acquiredDate}, #{agency}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_reward_info SET name = #{name}, acquired_date = #{acquiredDate}, agency = #{agency}, content = #{content}
mapper.select: SELECT name, acquired_date, agency, content FROM user_reward_info WHERE id=#{VALUE}
